item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】MP3 - Madonna · ROCK CHRONICLES [2023 concept album] MP3 320k full album
item.description:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE
Madonna's Virtual Rock Album "ROCK CHRONICLES" Finds Its Way Online

New York, June 14 2023 - Madonna, the legendary Queen of Pop, unintentionally embarks on an audacious musical venture with a virtual concept-album titled "ROCK CHRONICLES." Although not an official release, this rock-oriented album created and mixed by Dan·K consists of 18 tracks that pay tribute to some of the greatest songs in the history of rock, metal, alternative, and punk history. This exploration of the rock genre will remind fans of Madonna's early days as a lead singer and drummer for punk/rock bands "Emmy & The Emmies" and "The Breakfast Club", by offering a fresh perspective on iconic tracks by rock legends such as Oasis, Deep Purple, Nirvana, Metallica, Megadeth, and even The Ramones. Collaborations with Korn and a duet with Thom Yorke infuse the album with an eerie sound, showcasing both the boundless possibilities of AI and highlighting Madonna's musical adaptability. *

Tracklisting :
01. Wonderwall (Oasis Cover)
02. Black Hole Sun (Soundgarden Live Cover)
03. Smoke On The Water (Deep Purple Cover)
04. Rockaway Beach (The Ramones Cover)
05. I Was Made For Loving You (Kiss Cover)
06. Peace Sells (Megadeth Cover)
07. Killing In The Name (Rage Against The Machine Cover)
08. Testify (Rage Against The Machine Cover)
09. Coming Undone (Madonna & Korn)
10. Hypocrites (Madonna & Korn)
11. Let's Go (Madonna & Korn)
12. Battery (Metallica Cover)
13. Territorial Pissing (Nirvana Cover)
14. Seen It All (Madonna & Korn)
15. Something In The Way (Madonna & Korn)
16. Stairway To Heaven (Led Zeppelin Cover)
17. Tearjerker (Madonna & Korn)
18. Suspirium (Madonna & Thom Yorke)

Full album · 18 tracks · MP3 files · 320kbps · 198mb
